description: This file defines the main game screen component for a Tic Tac Toe React Native application, managing game state, rendering UI components, handling user interactions, and integrating AI moves.

methods.name: useCallback
methods.description: React hook for memoizing functions, used for event handlers and functions that depend on certain variables.

methods.name: useEffect
methods.description: React hook for handling side effects such as AI move processing and game end detection.

methods.name: useMemo
methods.description: React hook for memoizing computed values like game status to optimize re-renders.

methods.name: useState
methods.description: React hook for managing local component state such as game board, turn, and lock status.

methods.name: useNavigation
methods.description: React Navigation hook for navigating between screens.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets game state to start a new game with the specified first player.

methods.name: openGameOver
methods.description: Navigates to the game over modal with the result and options to restart or go home.

methods.name: onCellPress
methods.description: Handles user pressing a cell to make a move, updates game state accordingly.

methods.name: onRestart
methods.description: Resets the game to start a new match.
